      • addTrade

        public void addTrade(Trade trade)
        Creates a new trade and adds it to the listCurrentTrade
        Parameters:
        tradeUser - The user of the application
        tradePartner - The friend that the user wishes to trade with
        tradeStatus - The status of the trade
        tradeType - The type of trade

      • acceptTrade

        public void acceptTrade(Trade trade)
        search for that trade and change the tradeStatus to 1 and add the trade to listPastTrade update both user and partner's inventory
        Parameters:
        trade - The trade that you wish to accept

      • declineTrade

        public void declineTrade(Trade trade)
        Search for trades and changes the tradeStatus to 2, which represents cancelled
        Parameters:
        trade - the trade that you wish to decline

      • counterTrade

        public Trade counterTrade(Trade trade)
        Swaps the role of the owner and borrower, edits the trade constructs a new trade, and asks the user to edit the trade
        Parameters:
        trade - The trade that you want to counter

      • editTrade

        public void editTrade(Trade trade)
        Ask the user to edit the trade details, more like creating a new trade, but gives details about the trade. User can click the area on where they want to edit. Call setter from trade class.
        Parameters:
        trade - trade that you wish to edit

      • browsePastTrade

        public java.util.ArrayList<Trade> browsePastTrade(java.lang.Integer role,
                                                  Person person)
        Returns a list of all of your past trades
        Parameters:
        role - the role that the user had in the trade 0 -> User as an owner 1 -> User as a borrower 2 -> all
        person - the Person who's trade history you are viewing

      • browseCurrentTrade

        public java.util.ArrayList<Trade> browseCurrentTrade(java.lang.Integer role,
                                                     Person person)
        Returns a list of current trades
        Parameters:
        role - 0 -> Owner, 1 -> borrower, 2 -> All
        person - the person who's current trade list you want to view.

      • searchTrade

        public Trade searchTrade(java.lang.Integer id)
        Searches the trade which involves user via tradeID As a tradeID as a primary key, and one tradeID is assigned to one and only one trade Return the trade as soon as we find it Else returns NULL
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the trade you are looking for.
